question: Is there any dua which can change my husbands habit of lying,smoking ,drinking ,flirting.So that he could be loyal and sincere to me.
answer:
QUESTION
Assalamualikum, My husband had many relationships before wedding but he promised to be loyal and sincere to me .I love him very much .But now he lies a lot and having an affair too.I don?t want to loose him.Can you please tell me if there is any dua which can bring him back to me and never again cheat me.Please help me.He hurted me a lot but I still love him very much.
ANSWER


Share:
We understand your situation and our deepest sympathies are with you. We
make Du'aa that Allah Ta'ala assist and guide you.

In the circumstances that you are faced with, you have to have a lot of
patience and be steadfast. We suggest that you continuously advise your
husband in a kind and loving manner. Speak to him, give him encouragement
and gradually over a period of time win him over. Do not despair. Remember
that as long as you will be loyal to him even though he is disloyal to you,
Allah Ta'ala is with you. Be confident, do not lose hope and on a daily
basis try to speak to him and advise him. You may even try to establish Ta'
leem at home which will have a direct effect on him and everybody else.

We advise you adopt a Kitaab on Hadith and recite one or two Ahaadith daily
before having meals.

and Allah Ta'ala Knows Best

Mufti Ebrahim Desai
